title: Tolvan Big Band - Tarantula Suite 2011
description:
The Tolvan Big Band is one of Scandinavia's most experienced big bands. Located in MalmÃƒÂ¶, in southern Sweden, this orchestra has been working since 1979 and, under saxophonist/musical director Helge Albin, has collaborated with notable Americans such as Dizzy Gillespie, Dave Liebman and Michael Brecker, British composer Mike Westbrook and Danish saxophonist Lars MÃƒÂ¸ller - the band has even dedicated one of its programs to new arrangements of the John Lennon/Paul McCartney songbook.

On Tarantula Suite, reed player Cennet JÃƒÂ¶nsson takes the leadership. JÃƒÂ¶nsson composed and arranged an impressive eight-movement suite that stresses this big band's masterful collective musicianship and warm sound. JÃƒÂ¶nsson is a versatile composer and his compositions use the group's powerhouse energy and tight interplay, and its members' broad musical knowledge. (allaboutjazz.com)
